short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy-paste GitHub, LinkedIn, and portfolio links for job applications using Quack.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quack Chrome Extension: Simplifying Your Job Application Process!

Are you tired of juggling multiple tabs while applying for jobs? Quack is here to revolutionize your job application experience! This extension allows you to save all your essential links in one convenient location and ready to be copied and pasted, eliminating the hassle of constantly switching back and forth between tabs. 

Quack Features:

- Saves Links: Easily save your important links needed for job application like LinkedIn, GitHub, Portfolio, etc.

- One-Click Copy: Copy the links you need instantly! No more wasting time searching through tabs to find the URL you want. Quack allows you to copy your saved links directly from the extension, making it easy to paste them into your job application forms.

- Custom Links: You are not limited to just LinkedIn, GitHub, Portfolio. You can also add, save, and use any links you want!

Why Should You Install Quack?

- Boost Your Productivity: Save time when you apply to job. No more jumping tabs. 

How to use Quack:

- Install Quack.

- Paste your essential links to Quack's text fields.

- Hit Save to manually save or when you're finished typing, entering also saves that link!

- Turn on "Auto-save" mode for easy saving!

Your links are now saved and ready to be used!

- Hit + to add your custom links and hit x to remove any links you no longer want to save.
